name: Five Seconds Till Doom
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam!

You are a little white guy, that can't control when he can shoot or walk. 

So basically you can only, but really only shoot then 5 seconds later only walk and so on. 

With those issues you need to stay as long as possible alive.

I hope you still have fun, although the topic was not hit very well.

Your blek :D
